name: Flails
description:
Flails is a game that utilizes the unfixed bugs of Unreal Engine 4's physics. It consists of player hosted servers where you can slap your friends into oblivion with a flail.

That's pretty much it.

Join the Discord server: https://discord.gg/nJn8hUC

oh and we have custom colors that I wasted about 5 hours of my life on so yay
